name: @avcs/autosuggest
description: A JavaScript plugin to implement IDE like autocompletion in input, textarea or contenteditable fields.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:css
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup src/AutoSuggest.js --config --sourcemap --output dist/AutoSuggest.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/AutoSuggest.js --config --output dist/AutoSuggest.min.js
scripts.build:css: cp dropdown.css dist && uglifycss dropdown.css --output dist/dropdown.min.css

author: AvcS
